title: urf
body: How do you get the URF death animation?

replies.body:
You need to have one of the 3 URF 2015 summoner icons, and the death animation is only present in a game of Ultra Rapid Fire. That means you won't be seeing it in Ranked, ARAM, etc. Note that each summoner icon has its own unique death animation, so if you're thinking of buying one, choose carefully!

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/UZavO1j8A4c/maxresdefault.jpg
ARE these only available on URF days???
I knew I should hav got it last year{{item:3070}}

Oops, new update!
Turns out the legacy URF icons are back in store! I'm guessing it'll be in the store until the game mode ends on Monday :D

I'm pretty sure you can't buy them anymore.

But for people who did in the 2015 URF would be able to use them.
